title: Matching CIs
content:
There is a set of matching rules for each supported configuration item (CI) type. The service tries each rule, in order, stopping on the first successful match.

CI type Matching rules and order
Device

  1. GlobalId

  2. BarcodeOrRFIDTag

  3. AssetTag

  4. Model + Serial Number

  5. BiosAssetTag

  6. HostName + Domain Name

    Note: for a successful match with the last rule, both Model +Â Serial Number and BiosAssetTag must be empty.
ActualService
  1. GlobalId
  2. DisplayLabel
SystemElement GlobalId
ServiceComponent
  1. GlobalId
  2. DisplayLabel
